metadata.title: CVE-2018-11499 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A use-after-free vulnerability exists in handle_error() in sass_context.cppin LibSass 3.4.x and 3.5.x through 3.5.4 that could be leveraged to cause adenial of service (application crash) or possibly unspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: libsass: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
